22template <typename T>
23inline T map_norm_bipolar(const T in, const T out_lo, const T out_hi) {
24 return (in + static_cast<T>(1.0)) / static_cast<T>(2.0) * (out_hi - out_lo) +
25 out_lo;
26}
27
38template <typename T>
39inline T map_norm_unipolar(const T in, const T out_lo, const T out_hi) {
40 return in * (out_hi - out_lo) + out_lo;
41}
42
55template <typename T>
56inline T map(const T val, const T in_lo, const T in_hi, const T out_lo,
57 const T out_hi) {
58 const T in_norm = (val - in_lo) / (in_hi - in_lo);
59 return map_norm_unipolar<T>(in_norm, out_lo, out_hi);
60}
61
71template <typename T>
72inline T normalize_unipolar(const T in, const T in_lo, const T in_hi) {
73 return map(in, in_lo, in_hi, static_cast<T>(0.0), static_cast<T>(1.0));
74}

85template <typename T>
86inline T normalize_bipolar(const T in, const T in_lo, const T in_hi) {
87 return map(in, in_lo, in_hi, static_cast<T>(-1.0), static_cast<T>(1.0));
88}

98template <typename T>
99inline T to_bipolar(T unipolar) {
100 return map_norm_unipolar<T>(unipolar, static_cast<T>(-1.0),
101 static_cast<T>(1.0));
102}

112template <typename T>
113inline T to_unipolar(T bipolar) {
114 return map<T>(bipolar, static_cast<T>(-1.0), static_cast<T>(1.0),
115 static_cast<T>(0.0), static_cast<T>(1.0));
